questions: Is the claimant an insured under the policy at the time of the loss?
Was the vehicle involved listed on the declarations page?
Is the driver listed, excluded, or otherwise covered as a permissive user?
Did the loss occur within the policy period and within the covered territory?
Does the policy’s liability coverage apply to this type of accident or alleged damages?
Are there any exclusions that remove liability coverage for the driver, vehicle, or circumstances?
What are the bodily injury and property damage liability limits, and do they reset per accident or per person?
Does the policy cover vicarious liability or non-owned auto liability in this incident?
Is the vehicle covered under collision or comprehensive for this specific type of damage?
Are aftermarket parts, custom equipment, or modifications covered or excluded?
Is there any applicable deductible, and can multiple deductibles apply?
Do policy limitations apply, such as actual cash value vs. replacement cost?
Is UM/UIM coverage available for this claim, and does the claimant qualify as an insured under this section?
Does UM/UIM apply given the facts (hit-and-run, disputed liability, unidentified vehicle, etc.)?
Does the claimant qualify for PIP or Medical Payments benefits?
Are there any exclusions (e.g., using the vehicle for business, racing, DUI) that bar PIP/MedPay?
Does the policy exclude coverage for the driver’s conduct (DUI, intentional acts, criminal activity)?
Is the vehicle being used for a rideshare, delivery service, or commercial purpose at the time of the loss?
Does any other insurance or policy apply first (coordination of benefits / other insurance clauses)?
Has the insured met all policy requirements, such as timely reporting, cooperation, and proof of loss?
